/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, looking towards the horizon. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. On either side of the road, lush green trees and bushes line the path, their leaves rustling in the breeze. A few cars can be seen on the road, their colors muted against the vibrant backdrop. In the distance, a building with a red roof peeks through the foliage, adding a splash of color to the scene. The image is captured from a low angle, giving a sense of depth and perspective to the viewer.
